creator: Eilz2PSAEAA
name: Servicemesh - RPC requests Detector
programText:
from signalfx.detectors.against_recent import against_recent
A = data('gauge.consul.client.rpc', filter=filter('plugin', 'consul') and filter('consul_mode', 'client')).publish(label='A')
against_recent.detector_growth_rate_vanilla(stream=A, current_window='10m', historical_window='1h', fire_growth_rate_threshold=0.5, clear_growth_rate_threshold=0.3, orientation='above', calculation_mode='vanilla').publish('Servicemesh - RPC requests Detector')

rules.description: All the values of gauge.consul.client.rpc in the last 10m are more than 50% above the mean of its preceding 1h.
